longInfo:
Passport required. 
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  on arrival.
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a ID Card issued by the Gibraltar Authorities. 
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals of United
  Kingdom. 

Visa required, except for Holders of a Residence/Re-entry
Permit issued by Gibraltar. 
Visa required, except for Holders of British passports
